title: Is it true that paranormal activities are due to spirits? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, not always. Research ought to be done to determine if there's any medical cause, environmental cause, or psychological cause. Exorcisms, for instance, aren't conducted without first ruling out a psychological cause first. And research continues in places such as Skinwalker Ranch for environmental causes. And sometimes ghost stories are merely urban legends. Other times, events are yet unexplained. But spirits have been said to exist so we shouldn't easily dismuss that claim or rule anything out without looking at other factors first. Sometimes it is just a squeeky pipe or swamp gas (unfortunately 😟)

Yes. Very much. What we call paranormal is actually not the work of divine. Rather it is anti-divine. There are lot of myths or deliberate mis- representation of the concept of paranormal. All that is para-normal is actually work of dead spirits or anti-God elements. Its other name is black magic!
